title: Would you like to connect with you? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would but we wouldn't get far The conversation would stop after a while because she wouldn't know the answers to my questions because I, myself do not know (e.g. why do men still have nipples, like aren't you supposed to grow outta things you don't need like your appendix)ಠ_ಠ But besides that we'd have SO MUCH to talk about, ask how she's (really) doing, ask about school, friends(´∀｀)♡ It'd be a hoot.
